About Me

Let me tell you a few things...

BIO

I have been practicing law for 4 and a half years. In that time I found a passion for all things technology. I started off teaching myself C++. There were many moments when I wanted to punch my screen, I only continued because of those few times when you get an AHA moment and break threw a problem. The feeling is indescribable. I then began teaching myself Python. I really fell in love with Python. You could seemingly do anything with that language. I built scripts that scanned PDFs, twitterbots, texting code, automated social media posts, and keyloggers. I really enjoyed it but I wanted to learn more so I moved on to JavaScript. Which is currently where I am learning. Teaching myself in my spare time has been difficult, but it has taught me some invaluable skills, mainly how to search google!

I am looking for an opportunity to get my foot in the door and show what I know I am capable of.
